table.item:
Explore the staging environment to help plan build tech components as required.
Subscribe to staging environment via environment access homepage
table.verticals:
ONDC's staging environment helps you to explore various domains and use cases supported by ONDC. The ONDC tools are available in staging environments like mock server, sandbox, etc. assists you in developing relevant API integrations as per the schema and applicable attributes, enumerations, error codes, etc.
Depending on your preference, NPs are encouraged to subscribe to the staging registry and explore various tools and utilities. Expectation is that NPs subscribe to the staging environment before proceeding with subscription on preprod registry. They may use same subscriber ID between staging and preprod if required

table.item: Generate keys for network observability submission in preprod
table.verticals: Network observability is an important component within the ONDC network that allows for seamless transfer of data about the health of a transaction shared over a defined format. This is an essential and mandatory step to be carried out in production. In order to test this, NPs are expected to generate a token and verify their payloads before proceeding further.

table.item:
Path for submission of static terms - including orders, refunds, cancellations, IGM, payouts
Please note this is applicable for Buyer NPs for all domains within Retail, and for other domains Seller NPs
table.verticals:
These are certain general purpose terms and conditions divided into two parts:
  • 1. boilerplate conditions such as indemnification clauses, Limitation of liability clauses, etc.
  • 2. Conditions for refunds, cancellation, timelines for IGM responses, payout related conditions
It may be noted that for the Retail domain, Buyers define the static terms and in other domains it's the seller NP that defines static terms.
It is advisable not to change the static terms text, only the variable part marked within the static terms document gets updated so that it is easier for your counterpart NPs to review these terms easily. Do consider there are a large number of NPs on the network and it will be a task for NPs to review text for every NP. Hence this approach.Any changes that need to be carried out may be managed by raising a comment to ONDC via messages on ONDC participant portal
